mapper.select: SELECT dalf.`id` AS archivesFileId, dalf.`modified_time`, dalf.`original_name` AS archivesFileOriginalName, dalf.`context` AS archivesFileContext, dalf.`archives_library_id` AS archivesLibId, dalf.`data_id` AS archivesDirectoryId FROM data_archives_library_file AS dalf WHERE dalf.`formal_library` = 1 AND MATCH(dalf.`original_name`, `context`) AGAINST(CONCAT('*', #{keyWord,jdbcType=VARCHAR} , '*') IN BOOLEAN MODE) ORDER BY `modified_time`
